trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextDisposing" /> .

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextDisposing> event, and set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Tratar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextDisposing> evento e defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs> do objeto para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This prevents the disposal of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que o descarte do <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [o gerenciamento de ciclo de vida de contexto de objeto (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).

trans-unit.source: This example maintains the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> for future reference by handling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mantém o <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> para referência futura ao manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreated> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> usado pela fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The object context used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de objeto usado pela fonte de dados.
